column6: LOCATION
Lv. 45 - Route 12 and Route 16, blocking the path. Requires Pokéflute, only two available, always holds Leftovers.

defeating Gatekeeper Owen.

With Deoxys in your team, head over to Pewter City's museum, go upstairs and interact with the inscription where 
the Moon Stone is exposed. Choose the Deoxys that's in your team and select the Attack, Defense or Speed form. 
To turn Deoxys back to its Normal form, choose the Normal option.

With Rotom as your Follower Pokémon, head over to Oak's Lab or the Cinnabar Island Labs and interact with the 
big machine that's red at the top. Your Rotom will change its form depending on the option you choose.

Use Gracidea Key Item on Shaymin. To obtain this item, defeat Falkner in the secret area of Rock Tunnel, near the 
exit of Power Plant. Requires Z-Ring Key Item. Use the Gracidea again to revert to normal form.
Unavailable

Lv. 65 - Mt. Moon B2F. Requires Rock Smash HM.
Lv. 65 - Rock Tunnel B1F. Requires Rock Smash HM.
Lv. 65 - Viridian Forest Expansion. Requires Rock Smash HM.
Lv. 80 - Roams in Kanto (Roamers are unlocked after getting the 8th badge and heading over to Route 22).

Use Reveal Glass Key Item on Tornadus-I. To obtain this item, show any of the following Pokémon to a Scientist in 
Cinnabar Island Labs, third room: Tornadus, Thundurus, Landorus, Enamorus. Use the Reveal Glass again to revert 
to Incarnate Form.
Lv. 80 - Roams in Kanto (Roamers are unlocked after getting the 8th badge and heading over to Route 22).

Use Reveal Glass Key Item on Thundurus-I. To obtain this item, show any of the following Pokémon to a Scientist in 
Cinnabar Island Labs, third room: Tornadus, Thundurus, Landorus, Enamorus. Use the Reveal Glass again to revert 
to Incarnate Form.

Use Reveal Glass Key Item on Landorus-I. To obtain this item, show any of the following Pokémon to a Scientist in 
Cinnabar Island Labs, third room: Tornadus, Thundurus, Landorus, Enamorus. Use the Reveal Glass again to revert 
to Incarnate Form.
Lv. ?? - Seafoam Islands 1F, possible 6-Stars raid encounter.

Use DNA Splicers Key Item on Kyurem and Zekrom for Kyurem-Black, or Kyurem and Rehsiram for Kyurem-White. 
To obtain this item, show any of the following Pokémon to a Scientist in Cinnabar Island Labs, third room: 
Reshiram, Zekrom, Kyurem. Use the DNA Splicers again to separate both Pokémon.
Lv. 70 - Seafoam Islands B1F.

Use Necrozmizer Key Item on Necrozma and Solgaleo for Dusk Mane form, or Necrozma and Lunala for Dawn Wings 
form. To obtain this item, buy it for 50 BP from the One Island Battle Simulator. Use the Necrozmizer again to 
separate both Pokémon.
